```{r}
load("/Users/wangjiayu/Downloads/gpa2_v1.RData")
ls()

y <- Data$colgpa
x1 <- Data$hsize
x2 <- (Data$hsize) ^ 2
x3 <- Data$hsperc
x4 <- Data$sat
x5 <- Data$female
x6 <- (Data$female) * (Data$sat)
x7 <- Data$athlete

data_perfect <- data.frame(x1,x2,x3,x4,x5,x6,x7,y)
model_perfect <- lm(y ~ x1 + x2 + x3 + x4 + x5 + x6 + x7, data = data_perfect)
summary(model_perfect)
```
